item.title: Sarasota commissioners weigh cheaper jail plan that buys only a decade of relief
item.description: The $401 million project would create 725 beds, lifting operational capacity to 1,237 by 2033.

item.description: No trash, recycling, or yard waste will be collected.

item.description: The Sarasota Police Department will never call someone and demand money.
